metadata.title: CVE-2017-7227 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: GNU linker (ld) in GNU Binutils 2.28 is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow while processing a bogus input script, leading to a program crash. This relates to lack of '\0' termination of a name field in ldlex.l.

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.32-8ubuntu1').
